name: Jam
info: An app that allows groups of people to select music in real time based on their collective musical taste. I built the backend API and a lot of the music playback logic in the app itself.

name: Dots
info: Webapp that will aggregate your recent Facebook photo tags and build a visualization of social relationships.

name: MyTime
info: An application for the University which will help students stay more organized by linking Google services with existing university schedule data. It's running Python on Google App Engine.

name: Kaffee
info: A new way to visualize the popularity and location of local businesses. Our team plans to keep working on the project in order to develop a service to help businesses find new opportunities.

name: Mustard
info: A note-taking app that allows a group of students to take notes together during class. The web app syncs students’ notes in real time and allows for drag and drop photo and link sharing.

name: Artichoke Editor
info: Online code editor that allows a group of users to program and video chat simultaneously. The project was intended as a solution for college coding projects or interviews.

name: Smart Boots
info: Lead a research project at Michigan, working with MIT Lincoln Lab. Developing suite of gait and weight analysis algorithms ￼and custom hardware which monitor the health of the wearer.
